Posts.EditableText:
I am not sure if I have a game engine from a time when save buttons and texting save both did not work or were not automatic, or if other people can save my games, but I can not because, while my game engine is okay, I am too far away from the center to be a person who can save their games only.
I know its also possible that no one is able to save games, right now, and I hope that that is the case, but if it is not, does anyone know why I am unable to save any game I am playing, and whether or not it is affecting the games that I create, or who it is affecting besides myself?

Posts.EditableText: I also want to say, that my first two public games, both of which have command bars within which save can be typed, both had actual "save" icons several months ago, and now, do not have them, and also, cannot be saved. Is it possible that I had a better game engine before, saved the game source, but not the original game engine, reuploaded a version of the game, and lost the save button? What can be done?

Posts.EditableText:
I don't think the save button should be hurt by a version change.

Are you logged in while trying to play them? I believe the save button only appears online if you're logged in.

Posts.EditableText:
Yes, it is pretty obvious, now, that the lag is also heavy online, so the lag/connection speed might be the only problem. Does my speed when uploading affect other people's access to my game? Do all games go out at the same speed? My games have all been about 10mb. (give or take).
How fast a machine do I need? I mean the internet provider calls this "high speed" so it might be my laptop. Or my working from Canada.
